faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.label: Support
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our AI diabetes management platform.

items.question: How accurate is the AI food recognition?
items.answer: Our AI food scanner has over 95% accuracy in identifying common foods and estimating nutritional content. The system continuously learns and improves with each scan.

items.question: Is my health data secure and private?
items.answer: Absolutely. We follow strict HIPAA compliance standards and use enterprise-grade encryption to protect your health data. Your information is never shared without your explicit consent.

items.question: Can I export my diabetes tracking data?
items.answer: Yes, you can export your food logs, blood sugar readings, and trend charts in various formats (PDF, CSV) to share with your healthcare provider.

items.question: Do you offer integration with other health apps?
items.answer: We're working on integrations with popular health platforms and glucose monitoring devices. Contact us to learn about current and upcoming integrations.

items.question: What if the AI doesn't recognize my food correctly?
items.answer: You can easily correct any misidentified foods, and our AI learns from these corrections. You can also manually add foods that aren't in our database.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your AI Diabetes Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who are already managing their diabetes more effectively with our AI-powered platform.
